price: 86. Mpe ozalaki kolikia te ete: Bakotangisa yo buku, ezalaki ngolu kowuta na Nkolo wayo, kasi kosalisaka bapengwi te.
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ تَرۡجُوٓاْ أَن يُلۡقَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۖ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ ظَهِيرٗا لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta tarjū an yul'qā ilayka al-kitābu illā raḥmatan min rabbika falā takūnanna ẓahīran lil'kāfirīna
